name: Hot Toddy
description: Depending on whom you ask, it's either a warming winter drink, or the perfect cure for the common cold.
steps: Place the tea bag and a cinnamon stick in the bottom of a rocks glass.
Add lemon juice, maple syrup, whisky, and hot water, in that order.
Add cloves. Remove after a 2 minutes. (Alternatively, place cloves into a lemon wheel in the glass.)
footnote: If you don't have maple syrup, honey will do fine.
